title: Mount & Blade v1.003 + Crack
description:
Credits for Uploading: Me ( DArgo2006,DArgo26 )

Credits for Making it: ( Smart30 )


Bedtime Story:

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Journey to a land racked with bloodshed and ripe with opportunity. The war-torn kingdom of Calradia lures adventurers and mercenaries with its siren call of treasures to be won and dangers to be confronted. A strong arm, a sharp blade and a significant store of courage are all you need to begin making a name for yourself as a warrior. Pick up your sword and prepare to enter a world at war. Do you have what it takes to survive and attain a level
of power only warriors can dream of?
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Minimum System Requirments:
------------------------------
Minimum PC System Requirements
PC Operating System
Windows 98, Windows 2000, Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me), Windows XP, Windows Vista
PC System Memory
512MB RAM
PC Hard Drive Space
700MB
PC Video
64MB video card
-----------------------------

Tutorial:

1. Extract the mb_loader.zip

2. Put the files in same folder as game

3. Double click it...

4. Click ok when something comes up

5. Open it up again

6. When it asks for serial click on Enter Serial > MANUAL ACTIVATION > AAAAAAAAA > Disconect the Internet before playing the game for the first time.

7. Have fun playing it!
